name: 4 - Prepared
description:
Your essay is well written. This response shows good command over writing an argument with valid reasoning and sufficient evidence. You have included an introduction and conclusion, with satisfactory skill in language and Standard English.
To improve your score: You can still improve your score by more practice. Develop your introduction and conclusion, while also expanding on the evidence that you use to support your claim. Writing well takes practice, but you have a very good foundation.
